column1: Smoque BBQ////The bbq here is really good.  I got the sliced brisket platter with a side of mac and a side of fries.  The brisket was saucy and very tender - almost too tender
column4: was too small of a serving to be satisfying.  The serving of fries was a good size
column5: and the fries were delicious - skin-on and cut not too thick/thin.  Great cole slaw - I dislike the normal mayonnaise variety
column6: but Smoque's was tangy and refreshing with absolutely no mayo.
